mapper.delete: delete from key_word where 主键 = #{主键,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into key_word (主键, master_id, group_space, type_space, inner_space, upper_key, lower_key, modify_attack, delete_attack, query_attack, count_key) values (#{主键,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{masterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupSpace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeSpace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{innerSpace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upperKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lowerKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyAttack,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteAttack,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{queryAttack,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update key_word set master_id = #{masterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, group_space = #{groupSpace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_space = #{typeSpace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inner_space = #{innerSpace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upper_key = #{upperKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lower_key = #{lowerKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_attack = #{modifyAttack,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delete_attack = #{deleteAttack,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, query_attack = #{queryAttack,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, count_key = #{countKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where 主键 = #{主键,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select 主键, master_id, group_space, type_space, inner_space, upper_key, lower_key, modify_attack, delete_attack, query_attack, count_key from key_word where 主键 = #{主键,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select 主键, master_id, group_space, type_space, inner_space, upper_key, lower_key, modify_attack, delete_attack, query_attack, count_key from key_word
